- [ Swift ](/documentation/swift)

-  CancellationError() 

Type Method# CancellationError()

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
static func CancellationError() -> CancellationError
```

Available when `Success` is `Never` and `Failure` is `Never`.Deprecated

Task.CancellationError has been removed; use CancellationError
